subject: Re: AW: [junit] JUnit & Ant
msgSnippet: Thanks! looks like that did it. Do I feel a rookie.. ... optional task, to put the ... (ANT_HOME). ... but do you have junit.jar in lib too? -Vladimir To
messageBody:
Thanks! looks like that did it. Do I feel a rookie..


At 09:05 AM 6/29/2001 -0700, you wrote:
> declare your task, or, if this is an optional task, to put the
> optional.jar in the lib directory of your ant installation (ANT_HOME).
>
> And I have the optional.jar in lib.

but do you have junit.jar in lib too?

-Vladimir
